title: Ahri Looks Lonely...
body:
Why? and how will you fix it?

replies.body: https://www.fugly.com/media/IMAGES/Random/bitches-love-sonnets.jpg

She needs poro. Everyone is happy when they have poro.

Just accept it

Cho'Gath/Rek'Sai ship? 
Ew Rule 34

Hell nah, i don't ship that at all.

Ahri is not lonely, she is dissapointed at your poor capitalization.

*whoomp* 
*chiming noises*
Oh, we both know exactly how you would want to fix it, Leona. >:3

How? i thought it was obvious

i would profite from her lonliness to approach her and then spellsteal that knowledge on how she seduces people...

http://images2.fanpop.com/images/photos/5800000/Evil-gabriel-sylar-gray-5822583-500-400.jpg

then, i use that charm spell to seduce her and make her feel better... http://img12.deviantart.net/051e/i/2013/045/2/f/dota_2_valentines___rubick_by_shelzie-d5ux4kd.png
...no please
i guess it's the most evil plan i ever made.
http://scontent.cdninstagram.com/t51.2885-15/s480x480/e15/11195682_464010590428696_846485147_n.jpg?ig_cache_key=OTc0MTM3OTk4NTk4MzE3NTAx.2?noredirect
Shaco clones... Shaco and clone make everything better

Is clone being used as a noun or proper noun?

If it is a noun, it should be preceded by "his".

If it is a proper noun, it should be capitalized.

http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/616/861/ba7.jpg

*back stab*

Why do they fall for my traps so easily
*Angry chiming noises*

Yasssssss!

Her Shenpai didn't come to pick her up for the ball.

He had the night shift killing stuff.
All you need is to come around with a brush for her fluffy tails and a lot of free time.

You're not there and by having you show up
http://orig10.deviantart.net/c99d/f/2014/210/6/2/leona_x_ahri_by_thegadgetfishes-d7svy0f.jpg
Looks cold to me. She should go inside and sit by the fireplace.
She needs Leona, gosh just ship them already xD

doesn't she have a pet cat?
if not I can mail her one
http://tse1.mm.bing.net/th?&id=OIP.M55b57c3715c386addc99ef5148c0b974o0&w=298&h=300&c=0&pid=1.9&rs=0&p=0&r=0

Based on the statue lore, she is lonely because she has never been able to interact with people in kindness.
I will give her a hug and be her friend to cheer her up

omfg this shit again



NOOOOOOOOOOOOOO
Just accept it's a thing and move on
I would probably go and give her a hug

Well I think she ended up going support because there was a salty Riven player who locked in mid after she went her own pick, because some trolly Heimer went top and an overconfident Yasuo who went jungle, and they don't have a marksmen.

http://i843.photobucket.com/albums/zz357/donnielar2002/image_zpsymzlboaj.jpg

But sometimes you get a really awesome partner in lane with you nonetheless, and you win because you believe in them and they believe in you.

That is fun, she is paired up with me. 
'Lord Mordekaiser' the only skin I use, besides Renegade Talon.
Since the change of Lord Morde spalsh art I'm finding more and more using King of Clubs and Infernal.
Yeah, I wanted King of Clubs when I saw what Lord mordekaiser really was. The skin was a gift from someone I played with once.
Pet the fluffy tails of course.
I guess she doesn't want to consume anymore humans. Maybe a visit will be fine. But I got my eye on her and not in a way she has me seduced.

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/attachment.php?attachmentid=777130
She just needs good pat on head.
Id give her a hug, everyone needs a hug :(
I am a crab, so best way to fix this is to fall on her head.
How would that solve anything

not lonely and an emotion that isn't loneliness.

loneliness replaced with confusion and possibly rage.
God your hate yourself... Least your a good creature
